Html:
Hello,

SerializeOverlays Triggers an error:

...type GMapMarker_Custom is not marked serializable...

For GMapMarker_Custom i used the source provided here. How do i get this serializable?
mark it as serializable and implement serialize functions, just like demo markers

Hi Radioman,

never serialized any classes before(-;), but it seems to work so far. No errors are thrown. SerializeOverlays writes data in a stream, DeserializeOverlays is processed with no error.

BUT after 'DeserializeOverlays' the GMap-Control shows a red cross on a white background.

Any idea?
